name: filament-website-home
description: Homepage of the official website of filamentjs

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm run elm-prepare && npm run elm-build && $(npm bin)/webpack --progress --env.verbose
scripts.start: npm run elm-prepare && npm run elm-build && NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch webpack.config.js $(npm bin)/webpack-dev-server --progress --host=0.0.0.0 --port=8081 --env.verbose

author: Martin Feineis
